version_description:
- 全新設計、美麗又令人驚嘆的使用者介面
- 更高的市中心等級：你現在可以把財政提升到 125 級囉！
- 「規律記帳提醒」功能讓你輕鬆記錄重複花費
- 你現在可以在分析頁面搜尋過往記錄囉！
- 每日登入獎勵，讓你記帳更有動力！

- 全新設計、美麗又令人驚嘆的使用者介面
- 更高的市中心等級：你現在可以把財政提升到 125 級囉！
- 「規律記帳提醒」功能讓你輕鬆記錄重複花費
- 你現在可以在分析頁面搜尋過往記錄囉！
- 每日登入獎勵，讓你記帳更有動力！

- Brand new stunning design of user interfaces
- Higher level of City Hall
- Regular Reminder help you record automatically
- Search feature in analytics dashboard
- Daily reward give you stronger motivation to record expenses every day

- Theme System: Decorate your city with 10+ unique themes!
- 40 Brand New Designed Buildings: Upgrade your building to Level 8!
- 3 New VIP citizens and 3 New vehicles!
- And … Check out our improvement of better user interfaces!

・Brand new Chief Financial Officer subscription service now available!
- Trend analysis: analyze spending habits based on your personal spending history
- Budget management: set budgets for different categories with suggested daily expense limits
- Expense frequency: create watchlists for common expenses to reduce impulse spending
- But wait... there's more! Export your records for easier, more advanced management
・Manual data backups: cloud synchronization at a glance

■v3.0
-〖Brand New〗Chief Financial Officer 2.0 now available! Improved subscription features. Check out all 5!
* Category Reports: Easily see where your money is going
* Trend Analysis: Track major spending changes
* Budget: Set your own detailed budgets
* Expense Frequency: Reduce overspending on impulse buys
* Expense Review: Find more ways to save
- Keep track of your expenses with CFO to unlock secret rooms in City Hall! Come explore now!

■v2.9
- Brand new recycling system: welcome to the “underland”!
* Recycle buildings, get ore, and dig up the city's deepest secrets!
- City Hall: higher upgrade levels
- Bakery & Airport expansions: new Lv. 8 release

■v2.8
User Experience Optimization
- City engineers have chased some bugs out of town (bye!)

■v3.1
User Experience Optimization
- City engineers have chased some bugs out of town (bye!)

* Recycle buildings, get ore, and dig up the city's deepest secrets!
- City Hall: higher upgrade levels

■v2.8
User Experience Optimization
- City engineers have chased some bugs out of town (bye!)

■v2.7
- Brand new Food and Transportation building extensions
- Green Thumb: Download Plant Nanny² and complete the tutorial to unlock the Flower Shop building!
- City engineers have chased some bugs out of town

■v2.6
Christmas gift from the City team:
More Lv.8 buildings now available!

■v2.5
・Record with other mayors to form the best habits in 2019
- Customizable categories for more flexible expense management
* Customize category names
* Select your own icons
* Financial analysis at a glance
・City engineers have chased some bugs out of town

■v2.4
・Brand new look for the Winter:
- Lv.8 special buildings now available
- Upgrade Town Hall (Lv.200) and immediately receive a brand new appearance
- Town hall can now be upgraded to even higher levels: even more coin storage, citizens, and transportation!
・Enhanced user experience
- City engineers have chased some bugs out of town

----- 2.2 update ------
・City designer: interface optimization

- Smart Records: remember the currencies you’ve recently used
- Set Display and Account Currencies
・ Improved Post Office Interface : easily see messages
・ Quicker Start-up: an even smoother experience
